DOC.brief_summary: The purpose non-interventional study collect data efficacy safety Nab-Paclitaxel routine application .
DOC.detailed_description: The main focus non-interventional study set answer follow question : - Can result observe controlled clinical trial regard efficacy safety reproduce routine clinical setting ? - Are side-effects nab-paclitaxel therapy observe study comparable previously describe safety-profile term frequency intensity ? - What main reason modification termination nab-paclitaxel therapy ? - How nab-paclitaxel therapy influence patient ' quality life ? - What criteria select nab-paclitaxel therapy metastatic breast cancer ?
DOC.criteria: Female Patients metastatic breast cancer , least 18 year old ( upper age limit ) Contraindication accord summary product characteristic Abraxane® No sign patient inform consent form available pregnant breastfeeding patient .
